wikipedia_page.main: Roger Graeme Watson (born 14 January 1964) is a former English cricketer active from 1980 to 1985 who played for Lancashire. He was born in Rawtenstall, Lancashire. He appeared in two first-class matches as a lefthanded batsman and scored 33 runs with a highest score of 18.

response: Roger Watson, his uncle, played two first-class cricket matches for Lancashire.
